Text: Aaa shit, tack, ha letat efter denna

This is about Shaolin, but it's not Discovery Channel.  It's CHinese-made, and it's in mandarin (with burned in Chinese and Chinglish subtitles).

It's alright, but it's not Discover Channel quality.
this is the best movie about the shaolin monks that has ever been made...!!!
Thank you very much for seeding! This video is a great resource. My favoirite technique is "Iron Eggs". Unbelievable.
Towards the end, the documentary focussed on a man named Li Lian Je. He is Jet Li. A very young Jet Li. Jet Li = movie star.

I think some of you guys need to take this with a pinch of salt. YES!! It is a good documentary about the Shaolin monks. YES! its does feature Jet Li as a child. YES! some of the training scenes are good but PLEASE remember this was made as a propaganda film in COMMUNIST CHINA. Some of the feats are quite clearly staged and others insanely over-rated. The ONLY so-called "monks" at Shaolin now are those who practice Wushu (THIS IS NOT REAL SHAOLIN KUNGFU!!). Do some research about it online!!!
